name: data-structures-and-algorithms
description: An introduction to data structures and algorithms.

scripts.publish: npm run clean && npm run build && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'Update book' && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add . && git commit -am 'Update book' && git push git@github.com:cs-guides/data-structures-and-algorithms.git gh-pages --force
